main event: A civilian observed a white saucer-shaped object that disappeared slowly to the east in Indianapolis.
interesting points: The object was described as saucer-shaped and white., The observation lasted for 2 minutes., An airliner passed through the area but reported nothing unusual., The observer had no special background or training regarding aerial phenomena., There were inversions at multiple altitudes during the sighting.
witness description: A civilian treasurer named John Lippe Jr., early 30s, normally reliable.
